servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram .

entry.ptxt: Cannot receive transponder data from transponder

item.ptxt: Use of the ignition key without the transponder
Use of the unregistered ignition key
Corruption of the transponder in the ignition key

testgroup.title: DTC check
testgroup.question: Is DTC B1706 detected other than B1705?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

testgroup.title: Registration of the ignition key in use with ICM

test1.ptxt: Register ignition key in use with referring to Registration of the Ignition Key .

testgroup.question: Is ignition key in use registered?

action.ptxt: Check that engine can be started and recheck DTC.

testgroup.title: Registration of the spare ignition key with ICM

test1.ptxt: Register spare ignition key with ICM referring to Registration of the Ignition Key .

testgroup.question: Is spare ignition key registered?

action.ptxt: Check that engine can be started and replace ignition key which cannot be registered.

testgroup.title: ICM connector check

test1.ptxt: With the ignition key at OFF position, disconnect ICM connector.
Check for proper connection at all terminals and wires of ICM connector. Refer to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.question: Is each terminal and wire connection normal?

testgroup.title: ICM check

test1.ptxt: Check power and ground circuit of ICM referring to Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit .

testgroup.question: Is power and ground circuit of ICM normal?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ICM and recheck.
